en: One of the criticisms Dominique gave you is bothering you more than the others. You know he has far more experience than you do, but you're absolutely convinced his take on this specific issue isn't right. Should you fight it or listen to his feedback?
You argue with Dominique back-and-forth for a while, and eventually he agrees to go with your approach over his own.
You listen to Dominique's critique. After all, you're still learning.
